tool_description: Calculates RF interference levels between transmitters using propagation models and antenna patterns, accounting for frequency separation and power levels.

victim_sites.description: Site IDs of receivers experiencing interference

frequency_mhz.description: Operating frequency in MHz for interference calculation

terrain_resolution_m.description: Terrain data resolution in meters for path loss calculations

include_buildings.description: Include building clutter in propagation calculations

error_messages: Invalid frequency: Frequency must be within cellular bands (400-6000 MHz).
Unsupported propagation model: Use Okumura-Hata, COST-231, or Free-Space models.
Site data missing: Some transmitter or victim sites lack required location/antenna data.
Invalid terrain resolution: Resolution must be between 1-100 meters.
Invalid weather factor: Factor must be between 0.5 and 2.0.
usage: Provide transmitter and victim site arrays with frequency and propagation parameters. Returns interference levels and affected areas.

interference_matrix_db.description: Interference levels in dB for each transmitter-victim pair

critical_interference_pairs.description: Site pairs with interference above threshold

max_interference_db.description: Maximum interference level found in the analysis

affected_coverage_percent.description: Percentage of coverage area affected by interference per victim site
